entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms and hail early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:01 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:01 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023
